recipes.label: Tame The Waves
recipes.startdescription: The sea is fickle and prone to change. Sometimes she is calm and gentle. At the moment, she is not. She will devour me gladly, if I offer myself to her. I can approach her using the vigor of Heart or the prowess of Forge.
recipes.description: The sea is fickle and prone to change. Sometimes she is calm and gentle. At the moment, she is not. She will devour me gladly, if I offer myself to her. I can approach her using the vigor of Heart or the prowess of Forge.

recipes.label: Ceaseless Sailing
recipes.startdescription: The sea is my partner, and even if she lashes me, I will follow ceaselessly, ceaselessly, the sea, the she. We will probably succeed.

recipes.label: Stable Sailing
recipes.startdescription: The sea is my partner, and our union is a dance; the rise, the fall, the push, the pull. We will likely succed.

recipes.label: Steady Sailing
recipes.startdescription: The sea is my partner, and when she bucks and shivers, I will follow her pace. We may yet succeed

recipes.label: Bind The Waves
recipes.startdescription: She challenges me, but as men mastering metal, I will reshape her currents to carry me, and I will ride her as as my steed. I will probably succeed.

recipes.label: Crush The Waves
recipes.startdescription: She challenges me, but how men shattered stones, I will break through the barriers she throws at me.  I will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Break The Waves
recipes.startdescription: She challenges me, but akin to how man tamed fire, I can bend her to my will. I may yet succeed.
